pageContext.claim: “The Democrats never had a bipartisan agreement. They're trying to say that. They never had a bipartisan -- then tell them to come around and see me. They had an agreement that was a one-sided agreement that I would never approve.”
pageContext.analysis: Trump tentatively agreed to a deal under which Democrats would back his border wall in exchange for protections for DACA kids. But his more conservative advisors pulled him away from the agreement, convincing him that it would outrage his base. (The Democratic leaders also had trouble with left-leaning elements in their caucus.)
